attributes.additional_details: All historic evidence points to the fact that an unequal division of land, resources and wealth leads to extreme inequality, famine and war.   Its time we woke up.
attributes.background: Make it unlawful for any human, business or BANK to pay itself over one million pounds per annum.  All profits exceeding this must be passed down the employment chain and onto customers.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
